points.title: Some personal data may be kept after the end of the data retention period or a request for erasure
points.quoteText: ADT will retain this personal information as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.

points.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
points.quoteText: Our website(s) do not respond to browser Do Not Track (DNT) signals

points.title: Many different types of personal data are collected
points.quoteText:
• In General: When you use our website(s), service(s), and your device(s) you may be asked to provide personal information such as:
    • Name and/or business name
    • Home address and/or business address
    • Home, business, and/or mobile telephone number
    • Email address
    • Credit, debit, or other payment account number and related information
    • Date of birth or other identifying personal characteristics
    • Social Security Number
    • Emergency contact list information about others
    • Personal identification code
    • Product Specific: Certain device(s) or service(s) may collect additional information such as:
      • Audio, video, and still-image recordings from your monitoring device(s)
      • Geolocation and GPS information including physical location of your device(s) by using satellite, cell phone tower, or Wi-Fi signals
      • Motion detection, accelerometer activity, and climate conditions surrounding your device(s)
      • Monitoring event information such as arming and disarming your device(s)
      • Internet protocol (IP) addresses, internet service provider (ISP), date/time stamp, and/or other event data which is automatically collected and stored in log files

points.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
points.quoteText: In no event shall ADT, its Service Partners or licensors be liable for any damages suffered as a result of using, modifying, contributing, copying, distributing, or downloading any materials, information, software, products, and services included in or available through the Web Site. In no event shall ADT, its Service Partners or licensors be liable for any indirect, punitive, special, incidental, or consequential damages (including but not limited to loss of business, revenue, profits, use, data, or other economic advantage), however it arises, whether in an action of contract, negligence, or other tortious action, arising out of or in connection with the use or performance of information available from the Web Site, even if previously advised of the possibility of such damage

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection (Florida, USA)
points.quoteText:
Use of this Site shall be governed by all applicable Federal laws of the U.S.
and the laws of the State of Florida, without giving effect to its conflict of laws provisions.

points.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
points.quoteText: You have the right to amend or update inaccurate or incomplete personal information, request deletion of your personal information, or request that we no longer use it.

points.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising
points.quoteText: If you wish to opt out of interest-based advertising click here or if located in the European Union click here.

points.title: Your data is processed and stored in a country that is less friendly to user privacy protection
points.quoteText: Cross-Border Transfer: We may transfer, store, and/or access your information electronically or in hard copy in the United States or Canada.

points.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
points.quoteText: We may transfer your information to a third party in the event of any reorganization, merger, sale, joint venture, assignment, transfer or other disposition of all or any portion of our business, assets or stock, including in connection with any bankruptcy or similar proceedings.

points.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
points.quoteText: • Legal Authorities: We may also disclose your information for legal reasons including to comply with a subpoena or court order or similar legal process, to cooperate with law enforcement, or when we believe in good faith that disclosure is necessary to protect our rights, protect your safety or the safety of others, investigate fraud, or respond to a government request.

points.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
points.quoteText:
Before we share personal information, we enter into written agreements with the business partners which contain data protection terms that safeguard your data.
These companies may use your personal information only as necessary to provide these services to us, except as otherwise authorized by you for another purpose.

points.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
points.quoteText: We may share your information with partners and service providers (including ADT Authorized Dealers) to provide some of our service(s) and to complete our business purposes as described above.

points.title: Your personal data is not sold
points.quoteText: Third Party Providers: We do not sell your information to third parties for their own marketing purposes.

points.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
points.quoteText: Providing marketing and promotional materials

points.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
points.quoteText: <b>How ADT Uses Your Information

points.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
points.quoteText: We use the information collected from third party sources to determine the suitability of extending credit and for marketing purposes.

points.title: Your profile is combined across various products
points.quoteText: We may combine the above information with other information we collect or receive from other sources, such as public databases, joint marketing partners, social media platforms, and other third parties including, but not limited to, credit reporting bureaus.

points.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
points.quoteText:
When you download and use our service(s), we may automatically collect information on the type of device you use, operating system version, and the unique device identifier (or "UDID").
We collect your location-based information as part our service(s) to identify your location for dispatching or sharing with emergency service providers.
We will only share this information with third party services for the sole purpose of providing you our service(s).

points.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
points.quoteText: Log Files: We gather certain information automatically and store it in log files. This information may include Internet Protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet service provider (ISP), referring/exit pages

points.title: Logs are kept for an undefined period of time
points.quoteText: Log Files: We gather certain information automatically and store it in log files

points.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
points.quoteText: Our website(s) include social media features that may collect your Internet Protocol (IP) address of the page you are visiting and may set a cookie to enable the feature to function properly.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
points.quoteText: Local Stored Objects: We may store information about your browsing activities through locally stored objects by using technologies such as “Flash cookies” and HTML5 (“LSOs”). LSOs tack your actions and store information about your preferences and can be used by third party partners to deliver interest-based advertisements.

points.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
points.quoteText: Web Beacons: We may collect information about your browsing activities by using web beacons.

points.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
points.quoteText: Internet protocol (IP) addresses,

points.title: App required for this service requires broad device permissions
points.quoteText:
Mobile Application: We may collect information such as registration and activation information from our mobile application(s) associated with our service(s) and your device(s). 
  • Device Data: We may collect various types of data and event information from your device(s) by using cameras, microphones, GPS, or other monitoring sensors.

points.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
points.quoteText: ADT Inc. (and its and its affiliated entities) participates in and has certified its compliance with the EU-U.S. Privacy Shield Framework and the Swiss-U.S. Privacy Shield Framework.

points.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them
points.quoteText: Except where expressly provided otherwise by ADT, all comments, feedback, information, or materials submitted through or in association with the Web Site ("Submissions") shall be considered non-confidential and property of ADT.

points.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
points.quoteText: You agree to indemnify, defend and hold harmless ADT, its officers, directors, employees, agents, licensors, suppliers and any third party information providers to the Site against any and all losses, expenses, damages and costs, including reasonable attorneys’ fees, incurred in relation to, arising from, or for the purpose of avoiding, any claim or demand from a third party that your use of the Site violates the Terms, any applicable law or regulation, or the rights of any third party.

points.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
points.quoteText: ADT and its Service Partners make no representations, warranties, guaranties, or conditions as to the quality, suitability, truth, accuracy, or completeness of any of the Content contained on the Web Site.

points.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements
points.quoteText: ADT and its Service Partners hereby disclaim all express or implied representations, warranties, guaranties, and conditions, including but not limited to any implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, title, and non-infringement

points.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
points.quoteText: Except where expressly provided otherwise by ADT, the materials and information, software, products, and services included in or available through this web site (the "Content") are provided "as is"

points.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
points.quoteText: Unless otherwise specified, the Web Site is made available for your personal, non-commercial use only.

points.title: Your account can be deleted without prior notice and without a reason
points.quoteText: ADT reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to terminate your access to all or part of this site, with or without notice, without liability to you, any other user, or any third party.

points.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
points.quoteText: You agree to review the Terms of Use periodically for changes, modifications, additions, or deletions. Your continued use of the site after such notice has been given constitutes acceptance of such changes, modifications, additions, or deletions.

points.title: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes
points.quoteText:
Changes to Terms of Use

ADT reserves the right to update or revise the Terms of Use governing this site, or any part thereof, at any time, at its sole discretion, without prior notice. Such changes, modifications, additions, or deletions shall be effective immediately upon notice thereof, which may be given by any means including posting on this site or by other electronic or conventional means.
